name: Knight Adventures (EmilDev)
description:
The Knight Adventures is an action-adventure game full of  fun, rage and action. 

There is a knight who  is trying to survive from enemies. The danger is rising a lot by going to other places to protect yourself. You should be careful! Especially at night!.

Be ready for anything that can harm you.    Good Luck!

Firstly, you should challenge yourself whether you can do it.

  • Its difficulty will be divided in 3 types: Easy, Medium, Hard

Opinions about the idea of the game are much appreciated!
